profileAlternative.name: Ashita Barjatya
profileAlternative.headline: Big Data and Java Developer at TIAA GBS
profileAlternative.summary: A dynamic professional with 5 years of experience with design, development, customizations and implementation of software applications in Java Platform, Big data and MDM applications. Hands-on working experience in pipeline development, Data engineering with Big Data technologies like Sqoop, Kafka, Pig, Hive, HBase, Oozie, HDFS, AWS, Zookeeper,Spark, Spark Streaming, NOSQL ; Conversant with Core Java technologies. Worked alongside business teams to understand customer needs and translate them into technical specifications
